column4: I'm using Ubuntu 12.04, I selected Gnome classic, now I have no system tray and I can't log out. It's set to auto login so I can't change if I reboot the comp
How can I log out without a system tray?
did you remove the indicator-applet? alt+right click, add to panel, indicator applet complete
gnome-session-quit; in a terminal will also allow you to log out
